entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Chibougamau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:04 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -23.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chibougamau Chapais Airport 09:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

Temperature: -23.8°C
Pressure: 102.7 kPa

Humidity: 76 %

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
